condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: PRIORITY: PARTICIPATING: for every child, Development and Participation

description.narrative: In 2021, the GCO focused on the development of the;Child Friendly Cities Initiative;(CFCI), including;child and youth empowerment, as well as strengthening the participation of youth through programmes focused on life skills, personal empowerment, active citizenship and employability. The GCO;signed 6 MoUs with major Municipalities under CFCI, with two more MoUs underway. Aditionally, adolescents;and youth benefited from;job counseling,;skills assessment exercises and employability, skills building and entrepreneurship workshops. Finally, The GCO carried out a;labour market feasibility study and bottleneck analysis;to inform programme planning. | Status:Partially met | As-of Date:24/01/2022
